website_summaries.verdict: A compact-size backpack that measures up to its companions in the performance category.
pros: Features one interior and 4 exterior pockets
Perfect for holding a 15-inch laptop, but not much else
cons: Limited space keeps this bag from being a good overnight option

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this backpack today it's better than I expected!!! I'm a full time college student so I need to carry at least 2 books my laptop and a journal! It has plenty of pockets and 2 water bottle holders
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Perfection
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my 6th grade son for his school backpack. It's perfect for middle school or high school kids, with plenty of rooms for books, binders and even laptops/tablets - all at the same time. The padded shoulder straps are a huge bonus, and the quality is simply out of this world. I must also confess that I fell in love with the design/color pattern (Pacific/Pink Chroma), and ended up ordering a second, identical bag for myself for travel. It may say "Pink" in the title of the color, but it is more of a red/orange hybrid than pink at all.
customer_reviews.author: S.Friend

customer_reviews.title: Great and looks good
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! I had to get all black because of my likes.... Anyway I love how this bag feels on my shoulders and looks. Very cool bag and the laptop part is padded in a way. I recommend it?
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: My son goes through backpacks like water but this one is holding up great and ...
customer_reviews.text: My son goes through backpacks like water but this one is holding up great and looks very cool. My son is in 6th grade and he said everyone loves his backpack. The backpack feels very sturdy and well built. The shoulder straps are strong and have good padding and there are tons of packets throughout this thing.
customer_reviews.author: KJK1414

customer_reviews.title: Ripped/Tore, less than three weeks of wear
customer_reviews.text: The shape and capacity is great. I'm in nursing school so lots of things that fit great. I have been wearing for less than 3 weeks and it tore. Specifically the section where I only kept a planner and my badge so not heavily packed. I was happy with it initially but now I'm just disappointed that I lost money and have to look for another backpack this early into the semester.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Words cannot express how much I love this little bag to put my gym things in. Well, I guess words worked OK because I just said that. As a CrossFitter, I have lots of extra gym supplies: oly shoes, running shoes, 2 pairs of wrist wraps, knee sleeves, tape, jump rope, arm sleeves for ring movements, my notebook to track workouts, a weightbelt.... the list goes on. This bag is large enough for all my extra stuff, it organizes it nicely, and it matches my teal and white Nike MetCons. It seems to be pretty sturdy, but I'll re-review if it falls apart in a year.
customer_reviews.author: SBearOma

customer_reviews.title: My brother still dailies this backpack after almost 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: This was slightly smaller than expected, the material was a little lesser quality compared to other similarly-priced, off-brand items, and that's why the 4 stars! Which means, it could be tore down if you're not that careful with it, the materials used, polyester/plastic and fabric used, are not the best of quality.
customer_reviews.author: iBoolGuy

customer_reviews.title: and it looks like this one may even last more than the school ...
customer_reviews.text: As an 8th grader daughter has been through multiple backpacks and we finally found our brand of choice. This is so well made, every thought given to comfort for kids carrying ridiculous weights to and from school, and it looks like this one may even last more than the school year. The straps are really well padded, and so is the entire back piece which is great when carrying books and boxes with hard corners. Useful compartments, loads of space, and generally haven't found anything at all that we wish was different. Couldn't ask for more (other than for Under Armor to stop supporting trophy hunting!!!)
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M

customer_reviews.title: College-proof!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack four years ago before I started college. It has always been weighed down with several textbooks, laptop, binders, etc. It's the perfect size— it can hold all of my school stuff, plus a rain jacket or other miscellaneous items. I use it for school, for weekend trips, for camping. I take it almost everywhere. It has held up SO well! I've never had any issues with the zippers hanging up or with my belongings getting wet when it's raining. After four years, a hole is finally starting to wear in one of the corners. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Lewis

customer_reviews.title: One Year Later, Still Holding Strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack over a year ago, and to my pleasant surprise, it is still holding strong. I’m a college student and frequently use this backpack to carry heavy textbooks all day, and it still shows minimal signs of wear and tear. Not even a zipper has broken (which usually happens to my backpacks). It does hurt my back when I’m carrying my larger textbooks all the way across campus, but that’s to be expected when you carry 40 pounds up hill. Bottom line, best backpack I’ve ever bought.
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to take on a work trip since I would be hauling several books and paperwork with me and may need them while I was traveling. I was not disappointed. I used this bag to carry 2 very large college books, paperwork for my meetings, a change of clothes, and several items I would normally carry in my purse. The large straps made it easier to carry and didn't dig in to my shoulders and there are several compartments, so I was able to keep everything separated and access easily when needed. I would definitely recommend for sports or travel.
customer_reviews.author: SLB24

customer_reviews.title: Durable, comfortable, spacious
customer_reviews.text: I am using this bag for the one year on a regular basis for my class. I always carry 2 to 3 nootbooks and my 15.6 inch laptop and charger. There is a separate chamber for carrying laptop and it fits my laptop perfectly fine. The other two chambers are also spacious. The shoulder strips are very comfortable and sturdy. The bag itself is really very durable. Its easy to clean. After one year of regular use still it has the new look. I believe it will lasts couple more years without any issue. I am going to buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Nahid Sultan Al-Mamun

customer_reviews.title: Colors inaccurate
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black backpack with the (what appears in the photo to be) baby blue accents. It's not baby blue at all, but a very ugly ocean green colour. I tried for two days to like it or just accept it but it was an eyesore to me so I sent it back and got a refund. Otherwise would have been a great backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Nic Narc

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice but not nearly as strong as I expected from the underarmour brand, side netting for drink ripped within a couple months and is ripping at bottom of bag from book corners after a few months. Bought it for my 7th grader
customer_reviews.author: paula

customer_reviews.title: Two in one bag!
customer_reviews.text: My son says this is the coolest bag ever. He is seven and it's a little saggy on him but I figure he'll get two years out of it. I love that it has several pockets and two side pockets. He has even used it for baseball practice and games. It cleans up well also. His bat fit in the inside of the pocket outside and stood strait up so that's a bonus for me too.
customer_reviews.author: Momof1

customer_reviews.title: I love this bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag. Perfect size. Great material. I love the colors. The entire back is pink. I like the small pockets on back to keep cash etc in. I'm using this for travel. The straps feel like they may become bothersome because it kind of rubs on my neck when I put it on my back but maybe it just needs to be worn in.
customer_reviews.author: Shay

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this backpack
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this backpack! It came on time, and was exactly as it was pictured. The maroon color is awesome and I get lots of compliments on it. I was looking for something big and sturdy. I'm a college student who carries multiple text books, note pads and my lap top. This bag has plenty of room for all of that and some. I carry a pencil case, a laptop cooling fan, my cords and much more. There's so much room and the material is very sturdy. I would highly recommend this book bag for anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Fenske

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Convienent
customer_reviews.text: I bought mine for my college courses and it's a very comfortable backpack to cart around campus and has plenty of space and compartments for organization. The material is sturdy and I have seen no signs of tearing anywhere on the backpack. My only complaint is that the zippers for the compartments only go about halfway down the sides, which can make it difficult to get things in and out. All in all, it's a good backpack and I'm glad I bought it because my old backpack was breaking my neck.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great So far!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use for Disney World, as a diaper bag for the baby and snack holder for the older kid. It worked great! We got caught in one of those fast storms coming off the bus to go to Magic Kingdom, getting soaked for a good 20-30 mins without cover. The bag kept my phone and battery charger dry in the top pocket, and it kept our Rain Poncho's dry too while we were running for cover... to put on the rain ponchos.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack i've owned
customer_reviews.text: I change my backpack almost every 4 years because it is usually worn out by year 3. this backpack has been through so many years of school, so many travels to so many countries and it still looks brand new. The padded strap is so comfortable, so no matter how much the items in the bag weigh, it wont hurt your shoulders. it is a great item and I would highly recommend this to any students or travelers!
customer_reviews.author: Sajana Dumre

customer_reviews.title: I've yet to test it out in the rain but I expect it'll do fine. The zippers seem sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a very old Walmart backpack that was falling apart. I walk or bike most places so I need a backpack for all of my stuff. It's a decent quality and roomy, with plenty of pockets. I've yet to test it out in the rain but I expect it'll do fine. The zippers seem sturdy. Only issue is that I'm tiny (5' /104 pounds) and the backpack is larger than I was expecting (the straps are a little loose for me).
customer_reviews.author: starflowergardener

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. It's big and holds a lot of stuff for my son. He's in middle school, and it's a great size for him. He's very rough on things, but it's holding up great. He's been carrying it for 4 months and it still looks perfect. His last under armour backpack lasted him 3 years, and I expect this one will last just as long.
customer_reviews.author: A Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Backpack - I use it as a gym bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag is amazing! Fits all of my gym things.. shoes, clothes, towel, foam roller, lotions, soaps.. you name it! It's like Hermione's bag when they're out searching for horcruxes.. everything magically fits in it. (If you don't know what that means, the bag is still awesome - you just don't like Harry Potter as much as I do).
customer_reviews.author: Jess P

customer_reviews.title: but this backpack is legit pink and not purple like so many other products I have run across on ...
customer_reviews.text: Very rare to actually get the RIGHT shade of pink as pictured, but this backpack is legit pink and not purple like so many other products I have run across on this site. Good storage, good shoulder support, and fairly sturdy as well. I think the only thing I would love to have added to this is an added strap over the side pockets for large bottles. Those fit fine, but they tend to slip out the moment you hit the wrong angle, especially when you're putting it on/taking it off. Outside of that,
customer_reviews.author: Rekula

customer_reviews.title: Good compartment space.  Cheap material.
customer_reviews.text: The various compartments are good with generous space available. The straps are comfortable, at least for short walks/hikes. But the material is cheap, it feels (and sounds) like paper. The zippers are the low quality plastic kind, which tend to not last long. Probably on par for all backpack brands in this price range. I am fairly sure backpacks are similar to many other things you shop for; you get what you pay for. The blue and gray color combination I like, but the neon green accents I am not fond of.
customer_reviews.author: Curt M

customer_reviews.title: Storm is an interesting name tbh
customer_reviews.text: Not water resistant haha. Walked home in the rain after a physics test to find a ruined notebook (didn’t have my laptop thankfully). Good looking backpack, just keep an umbrella in one of the side pockets :^)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. This is great if you go to college and have to go from building to building in inclement weather. I have been caught in the rain many times, and my contents are kept dry. Also, it looks great, has a lot of compartments, and not too bulky.
customer_reviews.author: Leesa B.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bag ever.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite bag. And my old under armour bag just bit the dust after 4 years in high school. I bought this one for college and let me just say, it’s sturdy, it’s classic, it’s big enough for books and it’s got pockets galore! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Xiaomei

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy & Strong
customer_reviews.text: Didn't review this immediately because I wanted to see how it held up. My son carries a lot of books, laptop, etc. and backpacks usually last only a few months. This backpack has held up beautifully. Strong, quality product. I am extremely happy. Will buy again if we need one but it looks like this one is going to last forever!! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Robin Rose

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Collage Backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter uses this backpack for collage and it was a great buy. It is a heavy duty backpack that can carry a lot of weight. The pockets are good sizes and the laptop sleeve is lined with felt as an added protection. It is waterproof for the most part, some water did leak through the zippers even though they were fully closed. Apart from that we have no complaints! It is better than any JanSport backpack we have gotten and we will never go back! The styles are great and the color is a very nice grey.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack. I was hesitant to spend the money (i had the same backpack from middle school through 4 years of college) but I'm glad I did. Furthermore, I'm an Army guy, I've carried all kinds of rucksacks, backpacks, duffle bags, etc for miles/hours on end. I've never really considered comfort a vital issue, but this backpack definitely has it. The straps don't dig in, it rests well on my back, and carries contents comfortably. Can't say anything about durability/reliability yet since I've only had it for a couple weeks. But I'm very happy with it
customer_reviews.author: Joel B.

customer_reviews.title: My favorite backpack!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this backpack!!! It is comfortable and very roomy. I use it for work and it holds everything I need with room to spare. I also walked in to my house while it was pouring rain and not a single thing inside got wet. The outside of the bag was soaked but the inside was dry. I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Dyoshida23

customer_reviews.title: Worth it. Stop looking.
customer_reviews.text: Thank you! A backpack that my preteen can't destroy in a month! My son is 5'3" and in middle school. We needed something big, durable, and stylish. After searching for while, we chose this and I'm so glad that we did. It's perfect. It's still in fantastic shape after several months.
customer_reviews.author: AndiCat

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Nice distribution across the shoulders, comfortable, roomy, good pockets in the right places...bought for my college-age daughter’s schoolbooks and all the other stuff she schlepps around, and she loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Chin Music

customer_reviews.title: Good Backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is being used for an overnight bag and a school backpack for an 8th grader. She loves it. Very comfortable straps, durable heavy weight material and does not put added strain on her back. Good medium size for school books, binders, etc. Was a bit pricey, but it will last for years unless someone drags it behind a car or something.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love this bag
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag... I have been using this bag is a work bag and I love it it holds all of my stuff plus a jacket and lunch bag easily. I love all the different pocket and the different sizes. I have gotten compliments in the hallway while walking into work on how good the bag looks. It feels very nice on my shoulders and is very sturdy and durable. The zippers work Easley and feel very sturdy also.
customer_reviews.author: RN MOM OF 4

customer_reviews.title: Good storage and color/material but the straps were uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Good storage and color/material but the straps were uncomfortable and too wide-set for females. I have broad shoulders and it was still too big. The straps sat right on the edge of my shoulders. I can't imagine what female body type this backpack would fit comfortably. It would help if there was a chest clip on the straps to pull them together. Also, the straps themselves were so wide that they dug into my arms and neck at the same time. I am returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Zdawczyk

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love the color
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the color, but the backpack is set up a little weird... I'm still in school and often have to bring home several of my big books. the bottom of the backpack is a great size, but it tapers as it goes up and gets smaller. Because of this, if I ever have to bring home more than 2 textbooks, I have to carry something... Regardless, I still love the backpack...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Bright Green Backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend and he uses it every day. I bought it mostly for the color because it's his favorite. It ended up being perfect. Very durable with enough pockets for everything he needs. The only problem is because of the color, it gets dirty fairly easily. We just spot clean it and it's fine. Very comfortable to wear as well.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Amazing as a diaper bag!
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a diaper bag. I found actual diaper bags to be too small or too awkward to carry. This is working out perfect! Highly recommend all moms to get this bag for their kids. Lots of space and pockets for organization.
customer_reviews.author: Amber B.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Edit: October 2019- still in perfect condition and I have used it every school year since I originally bought it. Bought this last school year, it actually held up and I will be using it this year too. It is spacious and the multiple pockets and laptop holder are very handy. Defiantly recommend this book bag.
customer_reviews.author: Bri

customer_reviews.title: Very durable backpack!
customer_reviews.text: I love the two cupholders, one per side, and the many compartments of this bag. This bag can take a beating, I have used it for so much and it has held up great! The pink is a darker pink and there is a nice compartment for a laptop as well.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is great - it's roomy, doesn't hurt my back when loaded with books, and looks nice. It says it has a water resistant finish, and while it's way better at keeping water out than my last backpack, a few of my notebooks still got a little wet when it rained. Overall, it's a good backpack!
customer_reviews.author: charcoal

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and organized
customer_reviews.text: I needed a new backpack for work. I travel 150 miles round-trip for work daily so I have a lunch and have lots of other things I travel with. This backpack is lightweight but holds lots. All my chargers and headphones for travel. It has been fantastic. I would highly recommend and if I needed a new backpack, I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MBB

customer_reviews.title: Two net pouches on the sides for water bottles and the color is feminine yet not overly annoying. Love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm a powerlifter and use this as my gym bag. Plenty of room for two pairs of shoes, lifting belt, wrist wraps, the whole nine yards. Plus there's some extra pockets for pens, notebooks, first aid items, whatever. Two net pouches on the sides for water bottles and the color is feminine yet not overly annoying. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LadyPatriot76

customer_reviews.title: Very durable, my son used it for school.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, my son used it for school. Usually by the end of the year his bags are torn or have several tears in them which make them inoperable but this bag held up perfectly and the slot for his laptop provided the right amount of cushion
customer_reviews.author: BRANDY

customer_reviews.title: This is one among the Must-haves
customer_reviews.text: I received the bag on time and I have to say that the quality of the bag has been amazing till date. The laptop compartment is very neatly done and it gives you a sense of feeling that the laptop is safe! There is a pocket for your glasses in the front, a separate compartment for gadgets, a small keychain holder inside the bag and a water bottle holder on the right! This bag has everything you need if you are a traveller(short-trips), student, techie and the list goes on!
customer_reviews.author: Suraj

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace a laptop bag my husband had been using for 3 years. This item was perfect. He loves the padded shoulder straps and the fact that he has room enough for fit his laptop, laptop accessories, book, water bottle, and even lunch bag.
customer_reviews.author: LR

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Best backpack I have ever owned. More space than I needed. I was caring 2 backpacks, one for books and one for my computer. I was able to fit all my stuff in this backpack and still have room. Plus, the back straps are sturdy and help reduce pa8n in my shoulders from such a large load.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Y.

customer_reviews.title: This is an awesome looking backpack that gives a teen boy a run ...
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome looking backpack that gives a teen boy a run for his money! It has plenty of room, plenty of pockets and a great padded spot for a laptop. What I love most about this bag is how well is holds up, it's a sturdy bag that lasts and lasts despite what a teenage boy puts it through. Would definitely buy again (when needed!).
customer_reviews.author: rokkahulababy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent straps and aesthetics, not a lot of dividers inside
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack with a great fit around my shoulders. I'm a pretty stout guy and these straps really hug nicely and don't feel like they're going to slide off. The pockets are fairly standard with an unfortunate lack of little areas to separate different things. Overall I'm still pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Bowser

customer_reviews.title: Room for everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 13 year old daughter. She loves this bag! It is very roomy. It has a place to carry her laptop for school and she still has room for a few books and all of her practice clothes for volleyball and cross country. The shoulder straps have some sort of foam that she says makes it easier to carry heavy loads. It seems to be well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for 2 months as a sophomore - we will ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for 2 months as a sophomore - we will see how this backpack makes it through junior year.
customer_reviews.author: Pgolding999

customer_reviews.title: I use this for work and love it. I originally wanted the camo sling pack ...
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work and love it. I originally wanted the camo sling pack from under armour, but it's ridiculously over priced. I love the fact that it has two places for water bottles or whatever you want to put in there. I have no complaints about this backpack
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I've had this backpack for 4 years now and I can honestly say it gets a beating from me eveyday I use it. It is amazing. No tears yet and it has plenty of room for any and everything!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: This backpack is amazing. Not only does it look really cool
customer_reviews.text: This backpack is amazing. Not only does it look really cool, but is also made out of high quality material. The waterproof bottom part will come in handy. I ride the bus and train daily and more than once some one has spill coffee and as such my books have gotten damage. Finally, it is very comfortable and light weight. Can be happier with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Franky Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Looks great and an all in all great bag!
customer_reviews.text: I used it for university and now for work and it’s still amazing!! It’s a great backpack!
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Would purchase again..
customer_reviews.text: I would purchase this item again. The image reflects exactly what I received. I am a nursing student and need a place to hold my textbooks, notebook, laptop, charger, and other items that I carry on me such as gum, hand sanitizer and etc. The fabric on this item holds very well together.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Good quality bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my middle schooler when his Land End backpack finally fell apart after a couple of years in the middle of the school year (when Lands End doesn't have much selection any more.) my son loves this bad, and it's very well made. I hope to get a few semesters out of this one.
customer_reviews.author: BringMeAShrubbery

customer_reviews.title: Decent backpack and is actually waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Materials seem a little cheap, so I’m worried about how long it will last. It feels like it will last at least a year. However, it is waterproof which is why I bought it. Very roomy and I like all the compartments it has.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Small, not good for a high schooler.
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice, but can't fit a lot in it. Smaller than a traditional backpack. Very narrow inside. Tight fit for a school binder.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks even better in person
customer_reviews.text: Love the extra hard rubber yet padded detail surrounding the straps. You could tell this bag is top quality. Only problem is that I bought it for my 11 year old so the straps seem a tiny bit too far apart for her shoulder. But thats my fault cuz it DOES say 'women' so I'd recommend for an older teen atleast. She will grow into it. Its not that noticeable. We love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for 8th Grade - Senior
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 13 yr old, 8th grader. She will have this till she graduates high school. It is very roomy, she can fit her 2" inch binder in the back along with her 2 - 1" binders. In the middle pocket she can fit 2 - 1" binders. She said it is very comfortable to wear and doesn't drag your shoulders down with the weight.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Palmer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable. Perfect size for all my school books and my laptop. Would have liked a zippered mesh pocket inside for my pens but I put them in the sunglasses compartment so it all works out. Ordered the violet backpack but it came more pink. I think it looks better anyway :)
customer_reviews.author: Nikkiola

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack, Only thing I wish was there was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great backpack, Only thing I wish was there was a way to tighten up the compartments when I don't need all of the space. This pack can fit a LOT of stuff in it but when I only have a few things in it would be nice if I could snug it up a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: School bag for granddaughter
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my granddaughter and she loves it. She uses it for school and it meets her needs being roomy with pockets to separate items. The bag appears sturdy and she says it is comfortable to carry. Overall I would recommend this bag even though I thought it was a bit pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Janice Melton

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband after reviewing several other Under Armor backpacks. He loves it and I do, too. Great size, great quality, and perfect for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K. Schilling

customer_reviews.title: this is a great back pack with many compartments
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is a great back pack with many compartments. We had a similar back pack and it is still circulating through our home of four boys. The color on this is great! It is big enough for the days worth of books needed in middle school and high school.
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Still going.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son last Christmas to use this year at school. Usually by this time there are holes in the bottom of his backpack and it's time to order another one, but this one has held up better than the others he's had in the past.
customer_reviews.author: CBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: good backpack
customer_reviews.text: bought last august. seems to be holding up even when it's been loaded with books as many schools don't allow lockers
customer_reviews.author: Joel Gangross

customer_reviews.title: Teenager has not destroyed it yet!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very durable, my kids can mess up a backpack by the end of September each year. We are in January and it still looks great!! Finally a backpack he cannot destroy.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi

customer_reviews.title: Good backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Nice backpack. Perfectly roomy for a middle schooler, with lots of pockets. Seems durable and our experience with this brand prior says that it should hold up. My son loves the color and pattern. He was very excited when it arrived.
customer_reviews.author: Jojaka

customer_reviews.title: Great backpack for the busy student
customer_reviews.text: I've had this bag for over a year and a half now for graduate school and it shows no sign of wear. Fits everything I need. I carry basically my entire life in here. With an extra laptop case, I feel comfortable knowing that my macbook air won't get wet in light rain.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Must buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is literally the best book bag I have ever had! I always have my Ozark Trail cup (it's better than Yeti and only $8 at Walmart) with me. This is the first book bag I've had that allows the cup to stay in place and not tip over. Also, there's so much room inside. I love being able to compartmentalize my life.
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: This bag is built ultra sturdy. Still looks new at 3 1/2 months
customer_reviews.text: This backpack was for my 13 year old - girl - she is active, hard on bags and clothes and the last bag of another brand last 2 weeks before the zipper broke. This bag is built ultra sturdy. Still looks new at 3 1/2 months. All zippers intact. several pockets and my daughter is genuinely pleased with fit and function. I RECOMMEND THIS PRODUCT
customer_reviews.author: David R. Downey

customer_reviews.title: Large, sturdy book bag!
customer_reviews.text: This has held up for a year and a half and my son does not use his locker so it is packed full!
customer_reviews.author: EveryOtherDay

customer_reviews.title: Over 2 years old and going strong!!
customer_reviews.text: My son used this backpack for over 2 years in middle school (12-14 year old boy). The only reason he wanted a new one is for a new style. Still in great condition with a lot of use left in it. Straps are supported for all those heavy books. The bottom is usually what goes first and it is in great condition after 2 years. Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: April S Lopez

customer_reviews.title: The color is not the same, but it is much better!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag in the color: Black (007)/Blue Infinity. I loved this bag in the picture, but when it came in the mail I loved it even more! The blue is not the same color as the picture shows, but luckily I like it’s actual color more. If you google “light teal” you will get a closer color match. Overall this was a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Ephes.429

customer_reviews.title: The bag is quite spacious, plenty of room to ...
customer_reviews.text: The bag is quite spacious, plenty of room to stuff a 17.3" laptop(not in the sleeve though since the laptop sleeve inside is more spaced for a 15.6") and some. As for the color, in the picture it has a more purple/violet appearance to it, but on sunlight it has a pinkish tone to it.
customer_reviews.author: Prashanth

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality, perfect size m, reasonable price, if you're looking for a big back pack where you could pack a lot of stuff this is the one for you! And the waterproof feature is confirmed.
customer_reviews.author: Ross A.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! This backpack is heavy duty and versatile. I love all the pockets and the dual sided water bottle pockets. I highly recommend this backpack.
customer_reviews.author: SuzeTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: Best Backpack.
customer_reviews.text: Every year I find myself purchasing 2 to. 3 backs before the school year ends. Well this is a very good backpack, heavy duty. You won't be disappointed, for that price it's worth the but.
customer_reviews.author: Mo'  C. J.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love this backpack. It is great. It has been very useful and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great school backpack
customer_reviews.text: Excellent backpack for school. Was able to fit a chrome book with its case in front pocket plus tons of textbooks and folders. Not too many pockets to get continuing. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and durable. Just the right size for a ...
customer_reviews.text: Strong and durable. Just the right size for a tween. Very lightweight. I would buy this product again. If I had younger children, I believe the bag would be to big for them. Definitely for the 9+ age group.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: My 7th grade daughter picked this out... When it came in, she was SO excited! It is beautiful! It's big and holds everything a JH or HS student would need to take to and from school.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly the strength I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Strong bag, can hold everything I throw in it. I love everything about it. I recommed any STEM major student to get this due to high load of things that u need to put in a bag
customer_reviews.author: Medani

customer_reviews.title: Nice backpack
customer_reviews.text: I bought the black with the light blue backpack for my son, but when it arrived he didn't want it because he thought it was too girly, so I kept it. I really love it. Under armour make really good backpacks that last.
customer_reviews.author: Christina N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: This is a great backpack. It provides a lot of support on shoulders. I really like how lightweight it is and how it looks. Material is very tough and long lasting. Well worth the buy. Thanks under armour!
customer_reviews.author: Drew weaver

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this backpack! Great strong quality but it does sweat on your back in hot weather so not so great for bike riding or anything super active in hot weather!
customer_reviews.author: akdeacon

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it, he uses it to haul around ...
customer_reviews.text: Son loves it, he uses it to haul around his ridiculous amount of college books. No wearing or tearing yet.
customer_reviews.author: WiskiDave

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: So far my daughter loves this backpack. She carries a ton of books and backpacks tend to rip easily. So far this one is holding up. The pockets are nice and big and shoulder straps are very comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Renee S

customer_reviews.title: This is a very sturdy and well made bag
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my teenage son to use for basketball. This is a very sturdy and well made bag. I have always appreciated the strong durable construction of Under Armour bags. His bags take a beating from basketball gyms, school and travel. This bag has been great and washes well too!
customer_reviews.author: Angela B.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, mid-sized pack
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and comfortable. This is a medium sized pack. I probably wouldn't buy it as a commuter pack because I'd want something bigger, but it's great for day hikes and outings.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Awesome backpack
customer_reviews.text: Awesome backpack. My 13-year-old grandson loves it. Carries it to school and wrestling matches and for sleepovers. Holds everything he needs. Appears to be very well made and should last him for at least through the school year. He is hard on backpacks.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky Nana

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Works great as my sons daily backpack. Lots of heavy books.
customer_reviews.author: TFD 357

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking backpack
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking bag with lots of room. Husband seems to like it, and seems durable. I will update in a few months about the durability.
customer_reviews.author: Mommy Diva

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a good quality backpack that would have lots of room & ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this backpack for my son. I wanted a good quality backpack that would have lots of room & would last throughout the school year. The backpack has very sturdy straps & plenty of space inside. With four additional pockets on the outside. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Kim garrity

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy backpack
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has really liked her backpack this year and after a full year of school completed the bag still looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic45

customer_reviews.title: It looks good and excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: It looks good and excellent quality. The description matches the product. I ordered this to use for at least 1-2 years. But, I am waiting to see if it rips off after using for couple of weeks.
customer_reviews.author: HSR

product_meta.title: Under Armour Storm Recruit Backpack
product_meta.description: UA Storm technology delivers an element-battling, highly water-resistant finish .Tough, abrasion-resistant bottom panel .Soft-lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15” MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop .Water-repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe .Adjustable, padded, HeatGear shoulder straps for total comfort .2 side water bottle pockets .Comfortable top grab handle .Molle webbing & D-ring on front for extra organization .Volume: 2,013 Cubic In. / 33 L .
feature_bullets: UA Storm technology delivers an element battling, highly water resistant finish
Soft lined laptop sleeve—holds up to 15" MacBook Pro or similarly sized laptop
Water repellent front valuables pocket to keep your stuff safe
Adjustable, padded, HeatGear shoulder straps for total comfort
